price: 208 Nous n’avons détruit aucune cité avant qu’un prophète ne lui soit envoyé
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā lahā mundhirūna
